quest.name: Riveting Ramblings
journal: Forgemaster Brithael has something important to tell you.
Having singularly failed to articulate his blacksmithing philosophy, Brithael irritatedly bids you craft a dozen bronze rivets. Prepare the requested items and deliver them to him.

Brithael pronounces your rivets perfect before illustrating the importance of high-quality craftsmanship with another of his odd yet effective examples. Now that you have gained sufficient experience, he suggests that you try marketing your skills to other Lominsans by speaking with T'mokkri at the Drowning Wench.

※The next blacksmith quest will be available from Brithael upon reaching level 15.

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: Ye know what, lasslad? It may not be my place to say it─me bein' yer guildmaster an' all─but I like ye. I really like ye! Together, there's naught we can't─ What? Why're ye makin' that face at me?

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: Oh! No! I-I didn't mean it like that! Yer the most promisin' pupil I've had in gods know how long is all! I was just...waxin' sentimental fer a moment...

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: Ye can't honestly tell me ye don't get a bit emotional when ye've been out the night before an'─

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: Bah, forget it. Been workin' hard, have ye? Aye, I can tell. But this is jus' the beginnin', lasslad! Ye see, the art o' blacksmithin' is deeper than the deepest ocean─an' if ye plan on gettin' to the bottom of it, ye'll need to...ye'll need to...

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: ...Sink? No, that's no good. All right, how about this: if ye mean to set sail fer the faraway land of...um...smithin' mastery, ye must─I mean, ye mustn't try to make the journey in a dinghy!

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: Bah, the hells with it. Jus' make me a dozen bronze rivets, lasslad.

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: How're them rivets comin' along? Any time now, lasslad.

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: Praise the Builder, ye've done it again! These rivets're perfect!

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: Ah, but don't take that to mean they're special, 'cause they ain't. Ye see, rivets have got to be perfect, an' I'll tell ye fer why...

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: If yer poundin' somethin' an' yer hammer breaks, ye can jus' grab a new one. But it's a whole other story when yer rivets fail.

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: Ever seen an airship, lasslad? Marvelous things, they are, but bloody complicated. Now, imagine yer a dozen malms above Limsa, an' yer fancy flyin' boat starts springin' rivets... Might be as it's from the engine, might be from the hull─don't make no difference. Whichever it is, yer royally buggered.

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: If I was on that airship, lasslad, takin' in the gorgeous view as the confounded contraption tumbled down to the earth below, I'd be cursin' them rivets with all me heart─aye, an' the half-arsed bastard as shat 'em out, too.

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: An' ye wouldn't want that on yer conscience, would ye? Which is why ye must always make quality products what stand the test o' time.

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: To help ye learn the importance o' quality, I want ye to try smithin' fer payin' customers.

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: Start by havin' a word with T'mokkri, down at the Wench. She should be able to point you in the direction of a few Lominsans as need the services of a talented lasslad like yerself.

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: Hone yer craft, earn some coin─hells, have a drink while yer at it. The Wench is always servin'!
